title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When selecting a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Can you please explain what this message means?
OB: The scoped type hierarchy for binary projects is not displayed.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy for binary projects is not displayed.
SR: Display the class hierarchies of internal jars for binary projects in the scoped type hierarchy.
